title: Beautiful 3BR/2BA Home in a quiet cul-de-sac
posting_body: Overlooking a beautiful canyon in the Burlingame Hills sits a lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom ranch home for rent.
The home is 1,230 square feet with hardwood floors throughout and vaulted ceilings.
The open kitchen design with large granite island transitions seamlessly to a great room with floor to ceiling windows with lots of natural light overlooking said canyon.
Sun-filled deck with access to a large back yard.
Home is located on a cul-de-sac street with no through traffic, and access to top rated schools Hoover Elementary, Burlingame Intermediate, and Burlingame High.
The home has stainless steel appliances in the kitchen and a full sized washer and dryer in the garage.
Home is also equipped with a Nest home thermostat with central heat.
There is also ample storage in crawl space below home with shelving and cabinets.
Easy access to 280, close to 101 and conveniently located near large public transportation hubs like Millbrae Bart/Caltrain.
San Francisco and Silicon Valley are 30 minutes away to the North and South.
